__e: Where there are now two land masses, there once was just one.
And yet, I already know that what we say here means nothing to the masses of our country.
It can only be where there are now two land masses, there once was just one.
The talent does not always enough, in the eyes of the masses and the public.
I would like to thank the masses.. ...and my elder brother...
I knew that it was still a young company, The Masses, and I almost feel like, in a way, they almost weren't prepared for it either.
I'm more interested in the mass market in...
From roll call to crowd control in seconds flat.
The day they will return will change mankind's history forever, because then the truth will be revealed to the masses, in one instant, for everyone to see.
